name: PARABOX
description:
Designed within 3 days brings forth PARABOX for Geta Game Jam 10!

PARABOX is a 3D first-person puzzle-solving experience, where the aim is to escape the seemingly endless corridor using your skills and wit to navigate the rooms before you.

Controls

WASD to move
Mouse Movement to look around
E to Interact
Space to Jump
P to Pause

The Devs

  • Taronia Gamenstein as the Programmer/Level Designer/Object Animator
  • James_T_Ripper as the Graphics Designer/3D Modeler/Audio Composer

Borrowed Assets
Custom Font for use throughout the game:
MidNight Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/midnight-font.html
